Name: FRAME_RATE
Comment: Frame rate per second of screen update in Hz. 20Hz = 50msec

Name: SCREEN_BORDER_WIDTH
Comment: Border width of window of Windows. default = 8

Name: SCREEN_TITLE_HEIGHT
Comment: Title height of window of Windows. default = 31

Name: SCREEN_X_OFFSET
Comment: Adjuest X offset of window of Windows. default = 3

Name: SCREEN_Y_OFFSET
Comment: Adjuest Y offset of window of Windows. default = 5

Name: C_BG
Comment: Background color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_PS_DATA_ERR_TEXT
Comment: Error text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_BUBBLEINFO_RECT_FILL
Comment: Bubble info box fill color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_BUBBLEINFO_RECT_STROKE
Comment: Bubble info box border color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_BUBBLEINFO_TEXT
Comment: Bubble infor box text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_BUTTONS_NORMAL
Comment: Button normal background color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_BUTTONS_HIGHLIGHT
Comment: Button highlight background color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_BUTTONS_TEXT
Comment: Button text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_BUTTONS_BOX
Comment: Button box color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_UI_BUTTONS_BOX
Comment: Button box weight.

Name: C_PS_DATA_LINE
Comment: Scan points line default color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_PS_DATA_POINT
Comment: Scan point default color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_PS_DATA_LINE_POINT
Comment: Scan line and point default weight.

Name: C_PS_DATA_RECT_FILL
Comment: Scan info box fill color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_PS_DATA_RECT_STROKE
Comment: Scan info box border color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_PS_DATA_RECT_STROKE
Comment: Scan info box border line weight.

Name: C_PS_DATA_RECT_TEXT
Comment: Scan info box text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_GRID_LINE
Comment: Grid line color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_GRID_TEXT
Comment: Grid text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_TEXT
Comment: Interface menu text color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_FILL_NORMAL
Comment: Interface menu fill color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_FILL_HIGHLIGHT
Comment: Interface menu hightlight color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_BORDER_ACTIVE
Comment: Interface menu border active color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_BORDER_NORMAL
Comment: Interface menu border normal color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_UI_INTERFACES_CURSOR
Comment: Interface menu cursor color. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: C_LINES_LINE
Comment: Line color of background lines. Color data format is AARRGGBB

Name: W_LINES_LINE
Comment: Line weight of background lines.
